tool.name: SAGA.shapes_tools.17
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayTABLE False isArrayFIELD False output_data_CUTS $output_data_CUTS name SAGA.shapes_tools.17 TABLE $TABLE FIELD $FIELD prefer $prefer response $response outputType_CUTS $OutputSection_CUTS.outputType_CUTS transmissionMode_CUTS $OutputSection_CUTS.transmissionMode_CUTS

param.name: TABLE
param.label: Table / Shapes
param.help: Table / Shapes The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: FIELD
param.label: Attribute
param.help: Attribute The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_CUTS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value
